Sentencas: Aiming at the fabrication of microtubular anode-supports for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) applications, this contribution deals with the production of Ni-YSZ thin-walled tubes (<1 mm thickness) via Powder Extrusion Moulding (PEM).
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: The overall method has been optimized with an emphasis on the effect of NiO particle size using two commercial NiO powders with mean sizes of 0.7 and 8 mu m.
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: A thermoplastic binder system based on polypropylene (PP), paraffin wax (PW) and stearic acid (SA) in volume ratios of 50, 46 and 4, respectively, was used along with corn starch as a pore forming agent.
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: Different feedstocks with solid loadings varying from 45 to 65 vol% were processed and characterized to determine the optimal formulation.
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: Typically, the mixtures exhibited a pseudoplastic behaviour from 100 to 1000 s(-1).
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: Feedstocks with finer NiO particles had the most balanced properties for PEM purposes and an optimal powder volume content of 65 vol% was established.
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: After extrusion and debinding steps, defect-free and constant cross-section tubes with 15 mm of length and 4 mm of nominal diameter were obtained.
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: The final microstructure and DC conductivity were found to be closely linked to the NiO particle size, yielding a higher degree of open porosity and a better performance when using finer NiO powder.
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding

Sentencas: Based on this study, the packing mechanism was found to be likely limited by the contribution of steric hindrances when dissimilar and coarse powders are mixed, which may play a decisive role in order to set tailored formulations.
Titulo: High-performance Ni-YSZ thin-walled microtubes for anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells obtained by powder extrusion moulding
